attributes.action: stop bonus payments to high ranking RBS banking staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bank is effectively nationalised and the taxpayer is yet again being asked to bail out these incompetent greedy bankers - enough is enough. It is down to their mismanagement and greed that we are in this mess in the first place. No more bonus payments should be made until the bank is back in "private" hands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
